long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KISS FC Chrome GUI v1.15.8 - Flyduino KISS flight control configuration tool. 

Maintained by Alex Fedorov FedorComander, April 2017. 

Use this app to connect your KISS FC via USB for setup, adjustments and visual feedbacks.


Changelog:

- Added FW lock. This version cannot be used for older versions anymore. (be careful with import of your OLD configs, review all the pages!!!)
- Added FW1.2 support
- Added Tramp VTX support
- Added separate notch filters for roll and pitch
- Added i18n
- Added RX deadbands
- Added JR XBus mode B receiver
- Added LUA support
- Added saving with lipo attached
- Added activation screen
- Fixed FrSky Telemetry
- Added Warning Screens when firmware/GUI mismatch
